formulas.name: RecordType
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL($Record.Fellowship_Program__c, "U.S. Fellowship"), "0127d000001QHPZAA4", IF( ISPICKVAL($Record.Fellowship_Program__c, "India Fellowship"), "0127d000001QHPYAA4", IF( ISPICKVAL($Record.Fellowship_Program__c, "China Fellowship"), "0127d000001QHPXAA4", "" ) ) )
